snippet: “Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations” begins its ninth season, its last, on the Travel Channel.
abstract: Mike Hale asserts that Travel Channel program Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations, now entering its ninth and final season, is one of few reality television shows that make the viewer feel smarter for having watched them; adds that show is at its best when it is serious and sincere, rather than relying on exoticism or showmanship.
lead_paragraph: “Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations” begins its ninth season, its last, on the Travel Channel.

headline.seo: ‘Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations,’ the Final Season
headline.main: Eat and Run to Another Channel
headline.print_headline: Eat and Run To Another Channel
